document.full_text: the u.s. futures regulator must swallow its pride and ask congress for a delay in implementing derivatives regulations, some lawmakers and businesses said on thursday as they criticized the agency for moving too fast.
document.title: businesses, lawmakers urge cftc to tap the brakes
lines_and_colors: the u.s. futures regulator must swallow its pride and ask congress for a delay in implementing derivatives regulations, some lawmakers and businesses said on thursday as they criticized the agency for moving too fast.
